sections.heading: between owner and encumbrancer; order; effect
sections.text: The court may direct an issue to be made up between the encumbrancer and the owner, which shall be decisive of their respective rights.SourceR.S.1867, Code § 825, p. 540;R.S.1913, § 8308;C.S.1922, § 9260;C.S.1929, § 20-2192;R.S.1943, § 25-2192.Annotation
